sourcesContent:
import classes from './Checkout.module.css' // I wil USE the Ref to get the values once the FORM SUBMITTED **** import { useRef } from 'react' const Checkout = (props) => { const nameInputRef = useRef() const streetInputRef = useRef() const PostalInputRef = useRef() const cityInputRef = useRef() // Here After Creating Ref THEN we connect those to the FORM elements by ref{nameInputRef} const isEmpty = (value) => value.trim() === '' const isNotFiveChars = (value) => value.trim().length !== 5 const confirmHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() // Here We Submit the values const enteredName = nameInputRef.current.value const enteredStreet = streetInputRef.current.value const enteredPostal = PostalInputRef.current.value const enteredCity = cityInputRef.current.value } return (
) } export default Checkout
